mapper.sql: id, url, text, remark, parentId, isMenu, isVirtual, menuCls, sort, roleId, userId
mapper.insert: insert into resource( text, url, remark, parentId, isMenu, isVirtual, menuCls ) values ( #{text}, #{url}, #{remark}, #{parentId}, #{isMenu}, #{isVirtual}, #{menuCls} )
mapper.update: update resource set text=#{text}, url=#{url}, parentId=#{parentId}, isMenu=#{isMenu}, isVirtual=#{isVirtual}, menuCls=#{menuCls}, remark=#{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT res.text,res.url,res.isMenu,res.menuCls,res.parentId,res.id,res.isVirtual FROM USER u LEFT JOIN role_user ru ON u.id=ru.userId LEFT JOIN role_resource rr ON ru.roleId=rr.roleId LEFT JOIN resource res ON rr.resourceId=res.id WHERE res.isMenu=1 and res.url is not null and res.url!='' and u.id=#{userId} ORDER BY sort ASC
